overview: Robert is responsible for AddThis’ overall financial activities. Prior to joining the team, Robert was the Senior Director of Financial Planning & Analysis at Corporate Executive Board. Before CEB, Robert spent many years at AOL within the corporate finance and access teams focusing on profitably growing its membership base. Earlier in his career, he held various financial positions with Teleglobe International, MCI and Gyrofalcon Group. Robert earned his BA from the College of William and Mary and his MBA from the University of Maryland.
